Name: ORCS
About the game: ORCS is an action/platformer 2D old school inspired by classic like Castlevania and Ghosts 'n Goblins. It is very difficult and funny! Some features: - 5 bosses. - 24 levels (including bosses) - Gamepad support - Jokes! :) - and more!!!
Meta Title: ORCS: May 20, 2016, Pixel vs Pixel and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on ORCS? Check out the release date (May 20, 2016), developer insights from Pixel vs Pixel, and a complete game summary.
